title: Electra One preset format
description: Full description of the Electra One preset format version 2

version.title: The version of the preset format
version.description: A numeric representation of the preset file format.

name.title: The preset name
name.description: A name of the preset as it will be shown on Electra's status bar.

projectId.title: The project identifier
projectId.description: Identifier used by the Electra One editor to associate preset with an Editor project.

pages.title: The pages
pages.description: A list of individual pages of the preset. A page is a collection of controls that are shown on the screen at one moment.

anyOf.title: The typical page
anyOf.description: A page associate a a page name with an identifier. The page identifier is then used in other objects to include them on a specific page.

id.title: The page identifier
id.description: A unique identifier of the page. The identifier actually represent particular page within the array of 12 pages that Electra One can display.

name.title: The page name
name.description: A name of the page as it will be shown to the user on the status bar and on the page selection screen.
